translated: That is not so, because the collection of its causes appears in the manner of omniscience of all objects of knowledge, but not ultimately, like an illusory horse and so on.

original: gal te de lta na ni da ni zag pa zad do //
analyzed: gal te de lta na ni da ni zag pa zad do //
translated: If that is so, then now the contaminants are exhausted.

original: de ni dgongs pa ste /

original: 'dir chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi don ji lta ba bzhin la dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi don ji lta ba bzhin la dgongs pa'o //
translated: Here, the intention is to understand the meaning of the thatness of all phenomena just as it is.

original: gal te mtshan ma thams cad mkhyen na cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gal te mtshan ma thams cad mkhyen na cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If one knows all representations, what follows?

original: mtshan ma ni thog ma med pa'i las kyis bsgrubs pas 'khrul pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: mtshan ma ni thog ma med pa'i las kyis bsgrubs pas 'khrul pa'i phyir la /
translated: Because representations are established by beginningless karma, they are mistaken.

original: 'khrul pa'i yul la dmigs pa'i phyir 'khrul ba'i yul can gyi shes par 'gyur gyi ye shes ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'khrul pa'i yul la dmigs pa'i phyir 'khrul ba'i yul can gyi shes par 'gyur gyi ye shes ni ma yin no //
translated: Because they are the objects of mistaken consciousness, they are the objects of mistaken consciousness, not of wisdom.

original: gal te de nyid ye shes so zhe na gang gi phyir ji ltar gnas pa'i don shes pas ye shes zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gal te de nyid ye shes so zhe na gang gi phyir ji ltar gnas pa'i don shes pas ye shes zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If it is said that they are wisdom, then because of knowing the meaning that abides just as it is, it is called wisdom.

original: de gang gis 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de gang gis 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: By what is that established?

original: de ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so zhe na /
analyzed: de ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so zhe na /
translated: If it is said that it is established by individually discerning wisdom,

original: de ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i shes pa nyid sprul pa zhes bya bar yang mi 'gyur te me long lta bu'i ye shes dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i shes pa nyid sprul pa zhes bya bar yang mi 'gyur te me long lta bu'i ye shes dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not the consciousness of the Body of Bliss itself that is called the emanation, because it is devoid of the mirror-like intuition.

original: de ni de la yang mtshungs so //
analyzed: de ni de la yang mtshungs so //
translated: The same would hold for the other intuitions.

original: de bas na 'dir 'khor gyi snang ba ma gtogs pa gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na 'dir 'khor gyi snang ba ma gtogs pa gzhan ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, here the emanation is nothing other than the appearance in the retinue.

original: gal te longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku sgrub pa nyid de /
analyzed: gal te longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku sgrub pa nyid de /
translated: If it is the Body of Bliss itself that is the emanation,

original: sprul pa'i las bye brag tu bya ba'i phyir ro zhe na ma yin te snga ma'i skyon nyid do //
analyzed: sprul pa'i las bye brag tu bya ba'i phyir ro zhe na ma yin te snga ma'i skyon nyid do //
translated: because it is the special activity of the Body of Bliss, that is not so, because of the previous objection.

original: gal te 'khrul pa ni 'khrul par ma 'khrul pa ni ma 'khrul par mkhyen na ji ltar 'khrul /
analyzed: gal te 'khrul pa ni 'khrul par ma 'khrul pa ni ma 'khrul par mkhyen na ji ltar 'khrul /
translated: If it is known that error is error and non-error is non-error, how can there be error?

original: mtshan ma la dmigs pa'am mtshan mar snang ba de mi 'khrul pa ma yin pa de brjod dgos so //
analyzed: mtshan ma la dmigs pa'am mtshan mar snang ba de mi 'khrul pa ma yin pa de brjod dgos so //
translated: It must be explained how the appearance of the sign or the appearance as the sign is not non-error.

original: gal te gzugs dang sems so zhe na /
analyzed: gal te gzugs dang sems so zhe na /
translated: If it is said that it is form and mind,

original: gzugs ltar snang ba'i sa bon las byung ba'i phyir legs par bshad par @205a * //
analyzed: gzugs ltar snang ba'i sa bon las byung ba'i phyir legs par bshad par @205a * //
translated: it is well explained that it arises from the seed of the appearance as form.

original: 'gyur ro // 'di ltar chos 'di dag las kyi 'khrul 'khor gyis byung ba ste de nyid las sna tshogs par snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gyur ro // 'di ltar chos 'di dag las kyi 'khrul 'khor gyis byung ba ste de nyid las sna tshogs par snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because these phenomena arise from the mechanism of karma, and they appear in various ways due to that.

original: gal te sna tshogs pa de gcig pa'i rang bzhin yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te sna tshogs pa de gcig pa'i rang bzhin yin no zhe na /
translated: If that variety has a single nature,

analyzed: de ltar snang bar gyur pa'i shes pa snang ba nyid las mngon sum dang ldan pa'i skyes bu sa bon sna tshogs pa nyid do //
translated: then the person who has direct perception of the cognition that appears in that way would have a variety of seeds.

analyzed: dge ba'i las kyis bsgrubs so zhe na thams cad dge ba'i las dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur bas ci'i phyir 'og ma mi snang ngo //
translated: If it is established by virtuous karma, then everything would be endowed with virtuous karma. Why would the lower realms not appear?

original: gal te shes pa nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: gal te shes pa nyid do zhe na /
translated: If it is cognition itself,

original: tha dad pa'am tha dad pa ma yin par 'gyur /
analyzed: tha dad pa'am tha dad pa ma yin par 'gyur /
translated: it would be either different or non-different.

original: de ni gcig gis gcig spangs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ni gcig gis gcig spangs pa'i phyir /
translated: Because they are mutually exclusive,

original: de las gzhan pa brjod par mi nus so //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa brjod par mi nus so //
translated: it cannot be expressed as anything other than that.

original: gang gi phyir de dag rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rang bzhin du ma grub na ni gcig yod pa med na med pa mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de dag rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rang bzhin du ma grub na ni gcig yod pa med na med pa mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because if they are not established as having the nature of cause and effect, then the absence of one cannot be established in the absence of the other.

analyzed: gzhan yang don dam par gnyis su 'gyur ba 'di yang ma bzlog par 'gyur ba nyid do //
translated: Moreover, this transformation into two ultimate [natures] is not averted.

translated: do not observe the sign of form,üîΩup to do not observe consciousness, do not observe the sign of consciousness, and so on.

original: gzhan ni go sla'o //

translated: The commentary called Illuminating the Lamp,
